Unbuilt Labs is a startup exploring sustainable innovation & strategies through its own research, editorial, e-commerce and marketing ecosystem.

Type
Internship project
Deliverables
Prototypes (Desktop & mobile);
Brand style guide;
Timeline
2020-07-10 - 2020-08-15

My role & goals

Unbuilt Labs is a think tank - media company hybrid providing strategic foresight & sustainability initiatives. As a product design intern at Unbuilt Labs, I am responsible for researching and bringing a new editorial experience to the company's online products.

Two main goals in this project are:

  • Building style guide for unifying its entire online presence, internal communication and marketing purpose;
  • Designing new interfaces under its business website to showcase its teams' research projects.
Brand Style Guide

Design constraints

The new interfaces for showcasing teams' research projects includes 3 pages: research feed, post page, author page.

Design constraints are:

  • Each article preview on research feed page should be a repeatable component within a grid system;
  • The research feed should be differentiated from the editorial feed but maintaining the same image ratio and content elements in each component.
Thinking Process
Competitive analysis - 1-column grid
Competitive analysis - 3-column grid
Competitive analysis - 4/5-column grid
Competitive analysis - >5-column grid
Wireframes - Research Feed
